[[size larger]]Showcase for the best audio adaptations of articles on this wiki and on [#wl The Wanderers' Library].[[/size]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ How to add to this list" hide="- How to add to this list"]]
[[<]]
* Adaptations linked here should be completely faithful to the source material. Links here should not lead to adaptations that substitute in new words in place of redactions, or adaptations that are missing supplemental pages, or adaptations that skip sections of the article, such as the Containment Procedures.

* SCPs, tales, and GoI format adaptations are stored in separate pages. Changes made to those pages are reflected on this main page. _
Edit the following pages:
 * [[[SCP Series 8 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 7 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 6 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 5 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 4 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 3 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 2 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[SCP Series 1 - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[Foundation Tales - Audio Edition]]]
 * [[[GoI Formats - Audio Edition]]]

* Links to adapations of other types of article are part of this page. So edit this page if you have an essay, hub, etc. adaptation to add.

* If you see that a line you are adding to is commented out {{@@[!--like this--]@@}}, remove the {{@@[!--@@}} and {{@@--]@@}} to un-comment and un-hide that line.

* The names of the content producers/voice actors in the "Audio Links" column must be under 20 characters long.

* Please leave a descriptive [revision-note.png revision note].

* Avoid adding text-to-speech adaptations unless they are of exceptionally high quality.

To control bloat there is a limit of three adaptations per article. Feel free to add new readings in excess of this limit, but this page's maintainers will occasionally prune the lists down to three again.
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

For original audio works (interviews, reviews and audio dramas), see the [[[Podcast Hub]]].

[[module css]]
.section {
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #eee 0%, #eee 50%, #f7f7f7 50%, #f7f7f7 100%);
    border: 1px solid #888;
    border-radius: 20px;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1em;}
.section > p {
    display: none;}
.section h3 {
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    padding-left: 0.7em;
    margin-top: none;
    margin-bottom: none;
    font-size: 1.4em;
    font-weight: bolder;
    color: #901;}
.section > a {
    float: left;
    font-size: 1.4em;
    font-weight: bolder;
    padding-right: 0.7em;
    margin-top: 0.5em;}
.section table {
    width: 100%;}
.section table * {
    text-align: left;}
.section table td, .section table th {
    border: none;}
.section table *:first-child {
    text-align: left;}
.section table tr{
    background: #fff;
    border-bottom: 1px dashed #888;}
.section table tr:first-child {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #888;}
.section table tr:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;}
.section table tr:last-child{
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fff 0%, #fff 50%, #f7f7f7 100%);
    margin-bottom: 1em;}
.section table td:last-child {
    width:33%;
    background-color:#f7f7f7;}
.section td:last-child a {
    white-space: nowrap;}
.section table td:last-child {
     width:33%;
     background-color:#f7f7f7;}

.section .image {
	width:4em;
	border-radius: 50%;
	pointer-events: none;
	float:right;
}

.proposal table td:first-child,
.proposal table th:first-child {
     width:33%;
     overflow-wrap: anywhere;
     text-align: right;
}


.toc-table {
    float: right;
    margin-left: 1rem;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tr,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tbody td,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table thead th,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tfoot th {
    border: none;
    border-right: dashed 1px #999;
    border-left: dashed 1px #999;
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tr {
    border:none;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tbody td:first-of-type,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table {
    border-left:none;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tbody td:last-of-type,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table{
    border-right:none;
}
table.wiki-content-table th {
font-size: 1.2em;
}
.section tr:first-of-type th:first-of-type {
    padding-left: 15px;
}
}
@media (max-width: 479px) {
    .toc-table {
        float: none;
    }
}
@media (min-width: 480px) {
    .toc-table {
        float: right;
        margin-left: 1rem;
    }
}
[[/module]]
author: Dexanote
